title: Server for ship?
body: Hi there! I am stationed on the USS Carl Vinson (CVN70). We are going on deployment at the beginning of next year and a bunch of us were wondering if it were possible to get a server for us to play during our rare free time during every once and a while?

replies.body:
I'm not entirely sure I'm understanding what you're asking. Can you clarify a bit more? 

Are you not able to connect to the League servers from PC's on the ship?
Correct. We have no internet the entire deployment, except for 2 or 3 day port visits. We can play dota 2 offline, but a lot of us would rather play league if we had the ability to.

Unfortunately, Leauge cannot be played offline, so I believe in this situation, you'll only be able to play during port visits.

Feel free to let me know if you have any other questions.

*Thank you for your service, please come home safe.*
